BipService.cpp

00001 // BipService.cpp : définit le point d'entrée pour l'application console.
00002 //
00003 
00004 #include <ServiceControl/UserFriendlyAPI.h>
00005 
00006 using namespace Omiscid;
00007 
00008 bool Debug = false;
00009 
00010 void Usage(const char * Message)
00011 {
00012     fprintf( stderr, "%s\n", Message );
00013     exit(1);
00014 }
00015 
00016 int ParseConnectionString( char * Connecting, bool Prepare = false, char ** Table = NULL )
00017 {
00018     int pos;
00019     int length;
00020     int NbObjects = 0;
00021 
00022     if ( Connecting == NULL || (Prepare == true && Table == NULL) )
00023         return -2; // Bad parameter
00024 
00025     for( length = 0, pos = 0; Connecting[pos] != '\0'; pos++ )
00026     {
00027         if ( Connecting[pos] == ':' )
00028         {
00029             if ( length == 0 )
00030                 return -1;      // Bad format
00031 
00032             // Ok, we have one more object
00033             NbObjects++;
00034         }
00035         else
00036         {
00037             length++;
00038         }
00039     }
00040 
00041     if ( length != 0 )
00042     {
00043         NbObjects++;
00044     }
00045 
00046     if ( NbObjects %2 != 0 )
00047     {
00048         return -1;      // Bad format
00049     }
00050 
00051     if ( Prepare )
00052     {
00053         Table[0] = &Connecting[0];
00054         int InTable = 1;
00055 
00056         for( pos = 1; Connecting[pos] != '\0'; pos++ )
00057         {
00058             if ( Connecting[pos] == ':' )
00059             {
00060                 Connecting[pos] = '\0';
00061 
00062                 if ( Connecting[pos+1] != '\0' )
00063                 {
00064                     Table[InTable++] = &Connecting[pos+1];
00065                 }
00066 
00067                 // Ok, we have one more object
00068                 NbObjects++;
00069             }
00070             else
00071             {
00072                 length++;
00073             }
00074         }
00075     }
00076 
00077     return NbObjects;
00078 }
00079 
00080 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00081 {
00082     int Argument;
00083     char Message[512];
00084     SimpleString ServiceName;
00085     int ConnectionString = -1;
00086     int ConnectionObjects = -1;
00087 
00088     if ( argc < 2 )
00089     {
00090         Usage( "Two few parameters" );
00091     }
00092 
00093     if ( argv[1][0] == '-' )
00094     {
00095         Usage( "The first parameter *must* be the service name" );
00096     }
00097     ServiceName = argv[1];
00098 
00099     // Check argument before launching any registering process
00100     for( Argument = 2; Argument < argc; Argument++ )
00101     {
00102         if ( strcmp( "-o", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00103         {
00104             if ( Argument+1 >= argc || argv[Argument+1][0] == '-')
00105             {
00106                 // We consider it as the name
00107                 sprintf( Message, "Missing output name at parameter %d\n", Argument+1 );
00108                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00109             }
00110             if ( Argument+2 >= argc || argv[Argument+2][0] == '-')
00111             {
00112                 // We consider it as the name
00113                 sprintf( Message, "Missing description for output '%s' at parameter %d\n", argv[Argument+1], Argument+2 );
00114                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00115             }
00116 
00117             Argument += 2;
00118             continue;
00119         }
00120 
00121         if ( strcmp( "-i", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00122         {
00123             if ( Argument+1 >= argc || argv[Argument+1][0] == '-')
00124             {
00125                 // We consider it as the name
00126                 sprintf( Message, "Missing input name at parameter %d\n", Argument+1 );
00127                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00128             }
00129             if ( Argument+2 >= argc || argv[Argument+2][0] == '-')
00130             {
00131                 // We consider it as the name
00132                 sprintf( Message, "Missing description for input '%s' at parameter %d\n", argv[Argument+1], Argument+2 );
00133                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00134             }
00135             Argument += 2;
00136             continue;
00137         }
00138 
00139         if ( strcmp( "-io", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00140         {
00141             if ( Argument+1 >= argc || argv[Argument+1][0] == '-')
00142             {
00143                 // We consider it as the name
00144                 sprintf( Message, "Missing inoutput name at parameter %d\n", Argument+1 );
00145                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00146             }
00147             if ( Argument+2 >= argc || argv[Argument+2][0] == '-')
00148             {
00149                 // We consider it as the name
00150                 sprintf( Message, "Missing description for inoutput '%s' at parameter %d\n", argv[Argument+1], Argument+2 );
00151                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00152             }
00153             Argument += 2;
00154             continue;
00155         }
00156 
00157         if ( strcmp( "-v", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00158         {
00159             if ( Argument+1 >= argc || argv[Argument+1][0] == '-')
00160             {
00161                 // We consider it as the name
00162                 sprintf( Message, "Missing variable name at parameter %d\n", Argument+1 );
00163                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00164             }
00165             if ( Argument+2 >= argc || argv[Argument+2][0] == '-')
00166             {
00167                 // We consider it as the name
00168                 sprintf( Message, "Missing description for variable '%s' at parameter %d\n", argv[Argument+1], Argument+2 );
00169                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00170             }
00171             if ( Argument+3 >= argc || argv[Argument+3][0] == '-')
00172             {
00173                 // We consider it as the name
00174                 sprintf( Message, "Missing value for variable '%s' at parameter %d\n", argv[Argument+1], Argument+3 );
00175                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00176             }
00177             Argument += 3;
00178             continue;
00179         }
00180 
00181         if ( strcmp( "-ct", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00182         {
00183             if ( Argument+1 >= argc || argv[Argument+1][0] == '-')
00184             {
00185                 // We consider it as the name
00186                 sprintf( Message, "Missing connection strint after parameter %d\n", Argument+1 );
00187                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00188             }
00189 
00190             ConnectionString = Argument+1;
00191 
00192             ConnectionObjects = ParseConnectionString( argv[ConnectionString], false );
00193             if ( ConnectionObjects <= 0 )
00194             {
00195                 sprintf( Message, "Bad connection string in parameter %d\n", Argument+1 );
00196                 Usage( (const char *)Message );
00197             }
00198 
00199             Argument += 1;
00200             continue;
00201         }
00202 
00203         if ( strcmp( "-d", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00204         {
00205             if ( Debug )
00206             {
00207                 fprintf( stderr, "Warning: debug mode already set\n" );
00208             }
00209             Debug = true;
00210              continue;
00211         }
00212 
00213         sprintf( Message, "invalid option in parameter %d ('%s')", Argument+1, argv[Argument] );
00214         Usage( (const char *)Message );
00215     }
00216 
00217 #ifdef _DEBUG
00218         // MsgSocket::Debug = MsgSocket::DBG_LINKSYNC;
00219 #endif
00220 
00221     // Ok, it seems that parameters looks ok...
00222     // start registering service
00223     if ( Debug ) { printf("Launching service '%s' ", ServiceName.GetStr() ); }
00224 
00225     Service * pServ = ServiceFactory.Create( ServiceName );
00226     if ( Debug ) { printf("with ServiceId %s\n", pServ->GetPeerIdAsString().GetStr() ); }
00227 
00228     // Check argument before launching any registering process
00229     for( Argument = 2; Argument < argc; Argument++ )
00230     {
00231         if ( strcmp( "-o", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00232         {
00233             pServ->AddConnector( argv[Argument+1], argv[Argument+2], AnOutput );
00234 
00235             Argument += 2;
00236             continue;
00237         }
00238 
00239         if ( strcmp( "-i", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00240         {
00241             pServ->AddConnector( argv[Argument+1], argv[Argument+2], AnInput );
00242 
00243             Argument += 2;
00244             continue;
00245         }
00246 
00247         if ( strcmp( "-io", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00248         {
00249             pServ->AddConnector( argv[Argument+1], argv[Argument+2], AnInOutput );
00250 
00251             Argument += 2;
00252             continue;
00253         }
00254 
00255         if ( strcmp( "-v", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00256         {
00257             if ( Debug ) { printf( "Adding variable '%s' ('%s') with value '%s'...", argv[Argument+1], argv[Argument+2], argv[Argument+3] ); }
00258 
00259             if ( pServ->AddVariable( argv[Argument+1], SimpleString::EmptyString, argv[Argument+2], ReadWriteAccess ) == true )
00260             {
00261                 pServ->SetVariableValue( argv[Argument+1], argv[Argument+3] );
00262                 if ( Debug ) { printf( "done.\n" ); }
00263             }
00264             else
00265             {
00266                 if ( Debug ) { printf( "failed.\n" ); }
00267             }
00268 
00269             Argument += 3;
00270             continue;
00271         }
00272 
00273         if ( strcmp( "-ct", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00274         {
00275             // Already processed
00276             Argument += 1;
00277              continue;
00278         }
00279 
00280         if ( strcmp( "-d", argv[Argument]) == 0 )
00281         {
00282             // Debug option already processed int the validity checking mode
00283              continue;
00284         }
00285 
00286         sprintf( Message, "invalid option in parameter %d ('%s')", Argument+1, argv[Argument] );
00287         Usage( (const char *)Message );
00288     }
00289 
00290     pServ->Start();
00291 
00292 #if 0
00293 
00294     // Now we'd like to connect to ask connection point...
00295     if ( ConnectionString >= 2 )
00296     {
00297         char ** Table = new char *[ConnectionObjects];
00298         if ( Table == NULL )
00299         {
00300             exit(1);
00301         }
00302         ParseConnectionString( argv[ConnectionString], true, Table );
00303 
00304         WaitForOmiscidServices WFS;
00305 
00306         for( Argument = 0; Argument < ConnectionObjects; Argument+=2 )
00307         {
00308             WFS.NeedService( Table[Argument] );
00309         }
00310 
00311         printf( "Wait for %d services...\n", ConnectionObjects/2 );
00312         WFS.WaitAll();
00313 
00314         for( Argument = 0; Argument < ConnectionObjects; Argument+=2 )
00315         {
00316             ControlClient * CtrCli = new ControlClient(CtrSrv.GetServiceId());
00317             fprintf( stderr, "%s\n", WFS[Argument/2].Name );
00318             if ( CtrCli->ConnectToCtrlServer( WFS[Argument/2].HostName, WFS[Argument/2].Port ) )
00319             {
00320                 InOutputAttribut * ConnectPointAtt;
00321                 TcpUdpClientServer * TcpCli;
00322                 CtrCli->QueryGlobalDescription();
00323 
00324                 if ( (ConnectPointAtt = CtrCli->QueryInputDescription( Table[Argument+1] ))  ||
00325                      (ConnectPointAtt = CtrCli->QueryOutputDescription( Table[Argument+1] )) ||
00326                      (ConnectPointAtt = CtrCli->QueryInOutputDescription( Table[Argument+1] )) )
00327                 {
00328                     TcpCli = new TcpUdpClientServer();
00329                     TcpCli->SetServiceId( CtrSrv.GetServiceId() );
00330                     TcpCli->SetCallBackOnRecv( DropMessage, (void*)TcpCli, NULL );
00331                     TcpCli->ConnectTo( WFS[Argument/2].HostName, ConnectPointAtt->GetTcpPort(), ConnectPointAtt->GetUdpPort() );
00332 
00333                     continue;
00334                 }
00335             }
00336             else
00337             {
00338                 int zz = 0;
00339             }
00340         }
00341 
00342     }
00343 #endif
00344 
00345     printf( "Waiting...\n" );
00346     // Lock Mylself
00347     Event ForEver;
00348     ForEver.Wait();
00349 
00350     return 0;
00351 }
